column10: writing vacation. SUMMARY=Writing is an important asset for professionals and aspiring writers who want to establish authority in their field and share their expertise. However
column11: finding time to write can be challenging. Two strategies to help find time to write are creating small pockets of writing time every day and making better use of time by objectively looking at the day. It is important to remove distractions and set clear goals to maximize focus and productivity using the pomodoro method. Writing is a deeply personal pursuit that requires headspace and time away from mundane tasks. A writing vacation or close examination of daily life struggles can provide inspiration and help to establish a writing habit.
